ev3steuerung

Class EV3_Brick

  • java.lang.Object
    • ev3steuerung.EV3_Brick
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    MqttBrick

    public class EV3_Brick
extends java.lang.Object
implements MqttBrick
    EV3_Brick contains lightweight Hardware-Access and mimicks the Machine virtually
    Since:
    01.04.2016

      • manualFix

        public void manualFix()
        Method to call from MqttHelper when "manual fix" message arrives. This sets a fix flag, if the current State is instanceof Maint
        Specified by:
        manualFix in interface MqttBrick
        See Also:
        Maint, MqttHelper

      • messageArrived

        public void messageArrived(java.lang.String message)
        Method to call when a message is recieved on the Topic vwp/DEVICE_ID. No Checks have been made to the input. Handles produce, confirm, sleep
        Specified by:
        messageArrived in interface MqttBrick
        Parameters:
        message - Message that arrived over Mqtt from MES
        See Also:
        MqttHelper, Mqtt-Threads, Recipe

      • setState

        public void setState(State state,
                     boolean forced)
        Changes the State to a given new state
        Parameters:
        state - New State to work next
        forced - If the State shall be forced or not, default false. If true, no change of state can occur after this.

      • setWaiting

        public void setWaiting(boolean wait)
        Setter for Waiting Variable [TimeWindow]-For Message-Input When True, then a Message is awaited When False, then no Message is awaited
        Parameters:
        wait - The Boolean value waiting shall be set to
        See Also:
        Proc, Idle, MqttBrick.messageArrived

      • startMqtt

        public void startMqtt()
               throws java.lang.InterruptedException
        Method to start MQTT-Handling by creating a new MqttHelper Class and setting mqttHelper
        Specified by:
        startMqtt in interface MqttBrick
        Throws:
        java.lang.InterruptedException - When there was a problem creating the mqtt-handler
        See Also:
        MqttHelper

      • stopMqtt

        public void stopMqtt()
        Stops the Mqtt-Handler, closes all connections and deletes all folders
        Specified by:
        stopMqtt in interface MqttBrick
        See Also:
